body_html:
hi, @achalshah20 , the method you advised does work.
If I didn't set tensor name and import meta graph from model.meta, how could I get specified layer's tensor and corresponding op then? could I alter the op also reuse the weights please?
Could you give an example?
Thanks :)

body:
hi, @achalshah20 , the method you advised does work. 
If I didn't set tensor name and import meta graph from model.meta, how could I get specified layer's tensor and  corresponding op then? could I alter the op also reuse the weights please? 
Could you give an example? 
Thanks :)
